short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BoomConsole is the organizational tool to capture your online viewing experience with your description and folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bank Your Connections with BoomConsole

Bank Your Insights, Chats, Contacts and Web views to your personal database, Safe and Secure in the Cloud.

BoomConsole is a button and sidebar for your web browser that lets you describe your thoughts on the web page you are visiting, capture texts, images and screenshots of the page and secure the composition of all the captured information in folders you remember in your own personal safe database.

Search, Find, Organize, View and Review the insights in your safe.
We help you Secure Your AI Chats from Chat GPT, Google Gemini, You Chat and Poe Chat.

The Boom Console button known as an ‘‘Extension’’ or ‘Add-on’ that you download from the Google Chrome Web Store. The Boom Console Button works on the Chrome Browser, Edge Browser and Brave Browser. (Firefox and Safari coming soon)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Key Features:
1. Bank Your AI Chat Interactions:
Save and secure the chats you had with AI Chatbots like: ChatGPT, Gemini, You Chat, Poe Chat, then edit and export memories of your chats into Word, PDF, JSON, and CSV formats.

2. Bank Your Online Contents:
BoomConsole helps you to Describe and file the web pages you visit. Capture screenshots, HTML, URLs, images, off a website. Revisit your web pages whenever you need it.

3. Bank your Contact information
Import your contacts from social media platforms like: LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Google Maps, Indeed, and Monster. Store  phone numbers, emails, map locations into your personal contact manager and find them whenever you need it.

4. Smart Categorization
Consolidate all your chats, emails, contacts, and contents into the private organized directory system you create. Assign unique title names to the folders you remember.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Who Can Benefit?
-> Any internet user can benefit from BoomConsole by using it as a personal memory bank to save and remember important information, web pages, and online interactions.

-> Professionals and entrepreneurs can save LinkedIn profiles and industry-related online content for networking, market analysis, and business development enhancing project management and creative workflows.

-> Sales professionals can capture business locations, helping them keep track of important addresses and contact information.

-> Marketers can benefit from the screen capture feature to save visual elements, such as social media posts or website designs, for inspiration or content planning.

-> Professors can use BoomConsole to capture and combine online educational resources and course materials for curriculum development.

Try BoomConsole now:
https://boomconsole.com/signup

Disclaimer:
BoomConsole is an independent platform and is not affiliated with or sponsored by any of the companies whose data it captures, including LinkedIn, Google Maps, Indeed.com, and Monster.com. The use of trademarks and logos is for informational purposes only and does not imply endorsement.
